sourcesContent:
import { StyleSheet } from 'react-native'
import Theme from '../../styles/colors'

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
	container: {
		flex: 1,
		backgroundColor: Theme.cream,
	},
	containerCard: {
		backgroundColor: Theme.primaryLight,
		opacity: 0.6,
		marginTop: 20,
		marginRight: 20,
		marginLeft: 20,
		paddingLeft: 30,
		paddingTop: 18,
		borderRadius: 20,
		borderColor: Theme.primaryLight,
		shadowColor: '#000',
		shadowOffset: { width: 1, height: 5 },
		shadowRadius: 5,
		shadowOpacity: 0.3,
	},
	text: {
		color: Theme.text,
		marginBottom: 13,
		paddingBottom: 5,
		fontSize: 20,
	},
})

export default styles
